channel.title: I need some help

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

Well ya, I just can’t solve this problem, i’ve been trying to fix up rune c’bow on my source(delta, dont flame, thanks.)I just want to make it hit an occasional 60, so i made up an effect line or w\e it’s called.
My current code,

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837 && misc.random(8)==1){ specialAtk(true, 0, 600, 0427); hitDiff = misc.random(60); AttackingOn2.lowGFX(579,0); }But that doesn’t seem to work at all :\

Read full topic
